Entries.Mon4: Hey, @!$h#$e#How do you like it here in the desert?
Entries.Mon8: Hi there, sweetie. You sure come by a lot!$h
Entries.Tue2: Ah, it's such a peaceful day today...$h
Entries.Tue6: How's your week going, sweetie?#$e#Tell me about it.
Entries.Wed4: Bring me something from your farm sometime, @! I know how successful you are.$h
Entries.Wed8: Isn't it expensive, coming to the desert so often like you do?#$e#You must really like to see me, huh? Hmmm... $h
Entries.Thu8: I bet you wish you knew my real name, huh?$h
Entries.Fri6: Happy Friday, @!$h#$e#Oh... Farmers don't get much of a weekend, do they?$3
Entries.Fri10: Ah, @. You're looking handsome today.^Ah, @. You're looking lovely today.
Entries.Sat2: @! Lovely to see you! How's life in the valley?
Entries.Sat6: Oh, hello, sweetie!$h#$e#The weekends are always so slow... It's nice to see a familiar face!
Entries.Sat8: It's Saturday... You'd better get going! I'm sure a handsome man like you has a date tonight!^It's Saturday... You'd better get going! I'm sure a lovely lady like you has a date tonight!
Entries.Sat10: Say, honey, ever thought about moving to the desert? It's a nice place.$h
Entries.Sun4: Have you seen Emily lately?#$e#We've known each other for quite some time.$h#$e#She actually designed my outfit!
Entries.Sun10: You've been working hard, haven't you?#$e#I can tell.$7

Entries.give_flowersA: A bouquet!$6#$b#I love flowers! Thank you so much.$4#$b#Oh? Yes. I do know what accepting them means.
Entries.give_flowersB: ...! I accept!$h#$b#I still have work here.$4#$b#But I'm sure we'll make it work.$h
Entries.give_pendant: Yes! Of course yes!$h#$b#I love you so, so much!$4#$b#We just go and talk to the mayor of your town, right?$h
Entries.stardrop_gift: 'Oh, sweetie, can you talk for a second?$4#$b#I wanted to give you this stardrop to show my love.$h#$b#Thank you. For everything.$h
Entries.rejectNPCA: I appreciate the gesture... but I need to give it a hard pass.$1
Entries.rejectNPCB: If I went with you, it would be a hassle to go to work everyday.$1
Entries.reject_two_heartA: And give up the single life? No way!$h
Entries.reject_two_heartB: Sorry sweetie. I'm happy as I am.$h
Entries.reject_four_heartA: Work keeps me here, sweetie. I appreciate the thought.$h
Entries.reject_four_heartB: That's a no from me, sweetie. Hey, say 'hi' to Emily for me back in the valley, won't you?$h
Entries.engageA: Oh.. didn't you give this to who you're engaged to?  They should be wearing it already.
Entries.engageB: I'm sorry but I am not so scandalous.$2
Entries.marriedA: How did such a person like you get married?
Entries.marriedB: Proposing to someone and you're still married.#$b#I don't think you will hold a marriage for too long with that attitude.
Entries.refusal_knownA: A mermaid pendant! It's beautiful!$h#$b#I want one, but I don't want what comes with it.$7
Entries.refusal_knownB: A life on a farm, huh? Appealing, but no.
Entries.refusal_botherA: You know, it's kind of annoying when you keep shoving that in my face.$5
Entries.refusal_botherB: No means no! How are you not getting that!?$5
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: How nice... But I am not interested.  Thanks for the offer.$1
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: You're cute for asking.  But I'm not looking for a husband.^You're cute for asking.  But I'm not looking for a wife.

Entries.give_flowersA: Flowers! I love these! Thank you!$4
Entries.give_flowersB: You know, I never thought I'd get to see as many flowers as I do now.$h
Entries.give_pendant: Much as I appreciate it, wearing more than one would send... weird messages.$7
Entries.engageA: I... is it bad to say I want more?$7
Entries.engageB: I only need the one, sweetie.$4
Entries.marriedA: Are you building me a collection?$7#$b#Well, I can't say that I mind. They're beautiful.$h
Entries.marriedB: My my, sweetie. You sure are getting lucky finding these.$4

Entries.Rainy_Day_Sandy: Stay dry, sweetie! Don't stay outside too long.
Entries.Rainy_Night_Sandy: Dinner's ready, honey. I hope you like it. [218 732 207 224]$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_Sandy: Any plans to visit Calico Desert today, sweetie?#$e#If you go, be sure to bring back some coconuts and cactus fruit!$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_Sandy: The valley and the desert... Neither are completely silent at night.#$e#The kinds of sounds you hear are completely different, though.#$e#I'm still trying to figure out some of the valley sounds. They're mysterious.$h
Entries.Outdoor_Sandy: The sun here is so much easier on my skin. It's a relief not having to rub on sun block every day!$h
Entries.spring_Sandy: Wow... everything is so green here in the valley!$h
Entries.summer_Sandy: Let's go to the beach, sweetie! The weather's perfect!
Entries.fall_Sandy: The desert doesn't have fall colors like the valley does.#$e#I love it!$h
Entries.winter_Sandy: It's freezing!#$e#Ah... where did I put my coat...?$s
Entries.Rainy_Day_0: It's raining!$h#$e#I never saw a drop of rain in the desert.
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Stay dry, sweetie! Don't stay outside too long.
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: Good morning, sweetie.#$e#It's raining! Drink this and stay warm. [395]$h
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: I'm still getting used to the rain...$s#$e#I spend an hour on my hair and the rain completely destroys it!$a#$e#I don't know how you manage to look so put together, even sopping wet...
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: The rain is so beautiful.#$e#As long as I don't have to go out in it.$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: I wish it would stop raining already!#$e#But at least you didn't have to water the crops today.
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: Dinner's ready, honey. I hope you like it. [218 732 207 224]$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: The sound of rain is so romantic... there's nothing quite like it in the desert.$7
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: Hi, honey. I hope you didn't get too soaked in the downpour today.$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: I did some baking today, sweetie!$h#$e#Have some, it turned out great. [611 234 223 608 222]$7
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: You've decorated everything so cute!$h#$e#But I may make a few adjustments, if you don't mind...
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: I just love having a full kitchen. The possibilites are endless.$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: I baked muffins for breakfast, honey! Have one while they're warm. [651]$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: Any plans to visit Calico Desert today, sweetie?#$e#If you go, be sure to bring back some coconuts and cactus fruit!$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: What are your plans today, honey?$h#$e#Me? I'll probably do some dusting, some dishes... Fun stuff, you know?
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: I made dinner! [196 244 228 610]$h#$e#Go on, give it a taste.$7
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: The nights here are so cool compared to the desert. It's so nice!$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: I'm exhausted... Let's go to bed, sweetie!
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: It's been a busy day for both of us.#$e#Let's celebrate with a good night's sleep!$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: The valley and the desert... Neither are completely silent at night.#$e#The kinds of sounds you hear are completely different, though.#$e#I'm still trying to figure out some of the valley sounds. They're mysterious.$h
Entries.Outdoor_0: Ah, it's so cool out today!$h#$e#You don't think so...?
Entries.Outdoor_1: Everything here in the valley is so green. It's such a stark contrast to the yellow of the desert.
Entries.Outdoor_2: The sun here is so much easier on my skin. It's a relief not having to rub on sun block every day!$h
Entries.Outdoor_3: Keep up your energy today, sweetie.#$e#Here, this should help. A healthy snack. [613 398 634]$h
Entries.Outdoor_4: Tell me if you need any help, honey! I know more about sand than dirt, but I'll do whatever I can!$h
Entries.OneKid_0: I've always wanted to be a mother. Thank you for helping make it happen, @.$6
Entries.OneKid_1: %kid1 is such a little sweetheart! Just like you.$h
Entries.OneKid_2: %kid1 looks just like you, sweetie.$h^%kid1 looks just like you, sweetie.$h#$e#I know %kid1 is adopted... but it's true! Really!
Entries.OneKid_3: My mother called this morning. She wants to come meet you and %kid1 soon.$h#$e#My mother? She lives pretty far away. Much further than Calico Desert.
Entries.TwoKids_0: %kid2 looks so much like %kid1! They could be twins!^%kid2 looks so much like %kid1! They could be twins!#$e#I know they aren't related, sweetie... but we can't tell them that until they're older! Shh!$3
Entries.TwoKids_1: %kid1 and %kid2 are just perfect! They're such happy babies, never fussing or fighting.$h
Entries.TwoKids_2: Be sure to give %kid1 and %kid2 an equal amount of attention. We don't want to foster an environment of jealousy!#$e#I read that in a book.$h
Entries.TwoKids_3: Can you check on %kid2 for me? I'm about to feed %kid1.$h
Entries.TwoKids_4: We have the perfect little family, @! I'm so happy I could cry!$6
Entries.Good_0: @, I just love you so much that I don't know what to do with myself.$h
Entries.Good_1: Come here and kiss me, handsome.$7^Come here and kiss me, beautiful.$7
Entries.Good_2: I love you, sweetie.#$e#Go kick some farming butt and then come back home so we can spend some time together.$h
Entries.Good_3: To think you chose me over all the girls in this town...#$e#You made a good choice, sweetie.$7
Entries.Good_4: Lucky you didn't get married before the bus starting working again, right, sweetie?#$e#Otherwise our lives would both be completely different.$h
Entries.Good_5: Wow, you smell so good today, sweetie.$7#$e#So natural and sexy.$4
Entries.Good_6: I'm so fortunate to have such an amazing husband.$h^I'm so fortunate to have such an amazing wife.$h
Entries.Good_7: If I could, I would marry you every day for the rest of our lives.$h#$e#Ceremony and all!$h#$e#And the wedding night, of course.$7
Entries.Good_8: I picked this up on the way home from work the other day! [88 90]#$e#I hope you find some use for it.$h
Entries.Neutral_0: I wonder what I should cook for dinner tonight...#$e#Any requests, sweetie?
Entries.Neutral_1: I heard some strange noises outside last night...$s#$e#I tend to get a little jumpy at night.$h
Entries.Neutral_2: I found this on the way home from Emily's house the other day. [444]#$e#Pretty, isn't it? I hope it's useful.$h
Entries.Neutral_3: Are you hungry, sweetie?#$e#I'll cook soon.$h
Entries.Neutral_4: I keep meaning to visit the library... I could use a good book to read.
Entries.Neutral_5: There's never really anything interesting on TV, is there?$s
Entries.Bad_0: Sweetie... I could use some time alone.$s
Entries.Bad_1: You've been treating me so coldly lately...$s#$e#Is it someting I said?$s
Entries.Bad_2: Don't talk to me right now.$5
Entries.Bad_3: I think I should have just stayed in the desert...$s
Entries.funLeave_Sandy: I think I'll go visit Emily today! I haven't seen her in a while.$h#$e#Don't worry, I'll be home before you know it!
Entries.funReturn_Sandy: I missed you today, sweetie.$h#$e#Emily said hello, and to share this with you. [400 232 213 612 605]
Entries.spring_1: Happy New Year, sweetie! Here's to another year of love.$h
Entries.spring_12: Pelican Town has the most interesting festivals!#$e3I love watching the egg hunt. It's so lively.$h
Entries.spring_23: The Flower Dance is tomorrow, sweetie!#$e#I may be a little older, but I'll show all the other girls how it's done.$h
Entries.summer_1: The summers here are so much cooler than in the desert!#$e#It's such a relief to my sensitive skin...
Entries.summer_10: Oooh, I just can't wait to taste the soup tomorrow! Make sure to add something yummy, sweetie!$7
Entries.summer_27: The moon jellies are so beautiful! I can't wait to watch them with you tomorrow, honey.$h3$e#It'll be so romantic.$7
Entries.fall_1: The fall colors here in the valley are just incredible!$h
Entries.fall_15: I love the fair. Make sure to win me a prize tomorrow!$h
Entries.fall_26: I'm not sure if I'm brave enough to try the maze...$s#$e#Maybe if you hold my hand, @.$h
Entries.winter_1: Winter's barely begun and it's freezing...$3#$e#You'll have to keep me warm, sweetie! Otherwise I might freeze to death...$7
Entries.winter_7: I'll bring my heavy coat and cheer you on during the fishing contest!
Entries.winter_24: Tomorrow's the feast... I hope you're prepared. It's going to be huge!$h
Entries.winter_28: The end of another year... I'm glad we got to spend it together.$4#$e#Also... I'm a little drunk. Here, take this from me. [303]$7
Entries.spouseRoom_Sandy: #$c .5#I need to sort through my clothes today...#$e#I have some laundry to do. And I could do to get rid of a few dresses I never wear...$h
Entries.patio_Sandy: I've always wanted to have a flower garden! Now that I don't live in a desert, I actually can.$h

Entries.marriage_Sun.000: Hi, sweetie! I'm here to visit Emily.
Entries.marriage_Sun.001: I'm still getting used to living here in town.

Entries.Sandy0: Me, living on a farm... how exciting!$1#$e#And a big wedding...#$e#I can't wait.$1
Entries.Sandy1: Oh, @, I'm so happy!$6#$e#We're going to be great together.$6

Entries.sandyDancing: @!^^A little birdie told me you've never been dancing in Zuzu City before! I think we should change that tonight!^Meet me at my shop around 9 and we'll go out!^^  Love,^  Sandy^^P.S. Don't forget to wear something cute!! :)
Entries.morningAfter: @,^^Thank you for taking care of me last night. My memory's a little foggy, but I do remember how you tucked me in when we were back at my place.^I meant what I said when I told you I love you. It wasn't just drunk rambling! Really.^I'll see you next time you come by (make it soon!!!).^^Love,^ Sandy

Entries.Sandy: An egg hunt, huh? Hide and seek isn't really my thing, but watching the kids play sure is nice.
I love this festival! Flowers, dancing, there's nothing not to like about it!$h#$e#I'm definitely coming back next year!$h
You're making hot soup...on a beach...in the middle of summer. Yeah. Ok.
I'm excited to see them. We don't have jellyfish back home, let alone such beautiful ones!$h
Getting away from the desert is always a plus, but Gus's grill skills?#$b#Just those by themselves are worth a trip here.
Ooh! This is kind of spooky. It's fun!$h
It's chilly! It never gets this cold back home!#$e#Catch some big fish just for me, alright?$h
This is lovely, honey. It's so cold, but I can feel the warmth of the whole community.
